description:
This episode I show you how you can make very realistic and detailed brick pillars for your modular dungeon. The cost next to nothing in material and require little skill and no special tools. Great for any tabletop role playing game.

Join us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: Brick Pillar Dungeon Scatter Terrain For D&D Tutorial (Episode 013)
